title: Designing Elementary Mathematics Teaching Methods Using Big Data-AI Convergence Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics pedagogy and experience with LMS (Learning Management System) utilization
context.additional_context: Enhancing competencies in designing personalized mathematics pedagogy using big data and AI technologies for educational administrators in their 40s or older who guide elementary school students

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods for diagnosing learner levels and designing personalized math education content through big data analysis
Learners can implement individualized math problem creation processes using AI-based recommendation systems
Learners can propose plans to improve class efficiency by over 20% by applying computer-assisted instruction (CAI) tools in LMS environments

resources: LMS Platforms (Zoom Webinar, Google Classroom, etc.)
AI-powered educational recommendation engine trial software
Multimedia authoring tool for mathematics education

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
